name: feldspathic
content:

containing or relating to feldspar (= a common type of mineral found especially in igneous rocks): Feldspathic veins were detected in the rock sample under the microscope. The geology in this area is noted for its outcrops of feldspathic sandstones. These rocks are all felspathic, with a yellow-coloured surface.
More examplesFewer examplesThe clay in the excavated material was found to be of feldspathic origin.Analysis from the borehole sample showed that there was a thick layer of feldspathic silt below the sand.
